messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I will turn a blind eye if someone kills the person who made those clong tunnels

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Research Director's Office.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
General Alert

What the fuck was that?!

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I repeat, kill FIXES THE STATION AND HOP ON SIGHT, SEE EM KILL EM

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Biohazard Alert

Confirmed outbreak of level 7 viral biohazard aboard Tesla titties. All personnel must contain the outbreak.
